DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine efficacy multidisciplinary therapy physical , manual deontology therapy treatment temporomandibular joint dysfunction patient fibromyalgia syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Multidisciplinary Therapy Temporomandibular Joint Dysfunction Patients With Fibromyalgia Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Design : Randomized clinical trial . Objective : compare therapeutic effect physical therapy , manual therapy deontology therapy improve pain , quality life , physical function , quality sleep , depression , anxiety , clinical severity , clinical improvement , temporomandibular dysfunction patient fibromyalgia syndrome . Methods measure : seventy patient randomly assign experimental placebo control group . The experimental group receive 30 session ( twice week ) physical therapy , manual therapy deontology therapy . Pain intensity , impact fibromyalgia symptom , quality sleep , depression , anxiety , clinical severity , clinical improvement temporomandibular dysfunction collect group al baseline , 15 week 20 week 48-hr last intervention experimental placebo control group , assessor blind treatment allocation patient . Baseline demographic clinical variable examine group independent Student t-test continuous data chi-square test independence categorical data . Separate 2x3 model ANOVA time ( baseline , 15 week 20 week ) within-subjects factor , group ( experimental , placebo control ) determine effect multidisciplinary treatment .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis Fibromyalgia Syndrome Agreement attend even therapy session A chief complaint acute pain ( duration < 6 month ) temporomandibular joint least one side . The presence joint click jaw opening eliminate protrusive opening . History recent trauma . Therapeutic cointerventions treatment . Indication surgical treatment temporomandibular joint . Edentulism . Physical mental illness precludes attendance therapy session .
